label: 冷泉万里小路殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
見出し読み: れいぜいまでのこうじどの
説明文: Also Madenokōji Mansion, Reizei Mansion. At one time a property of Fujiwara (Shijō) Takachika; located north of Reizei and west of Madenokōji. Used as a palace (dairi) by Tsuchimikado, Shijō, and Go-Saga; also usded at times by Kameyama, Go-Uda, and Go-Nijō. Burned in 1273; rebuilt. [also see see Tominokōji Palace] [藤原（四条）隆親、内裏、土御門、四条、後嵯峨、亀山、後宇多、後二条、富小路]
